programme.title: S.W.A.T.

programme.desc: A family takes a local officer hostage when they're evicted from their home; Hondo reflects on his personal life choices as he helps his father through a medical crisis; Chris' relationship with Kira and Ty reaches a critical juncture.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.

programme.desc: When an explosion at a military cemetery's mausoleum reveals a cache of dismembered human remains, the team searches for a potential serial killer.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: When a petty officer on whom McGee based a character for his latest book is murdered, McGee must figure out who could have accessed his secret manuscript.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs leads the investigation into a murder victim found in a taxi headed to NCIS headquarters; Jenny discovers a secret about her past.

programme.desc: Upon the director's return from a European junket, the team's secrets unravel; a merciless drug dealer holds Dinozzo and his girlfriend captive.

programme.desc: Fred and Lamont see a television series that resembles their lives. They become furious and prepare to sue the network.

programme.desc: Fred tries to transform Esther's appearance to win a beauty contest so that her husband gives him the prize money.
